items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a strong start; US, Asian markets gain
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street closed higher on Friday, with all three major indexes posting weekly gains, as investors took comfort from data pointing to robust economic activity in the world's biggest economy. The Dow Jones Industrial Average rose 426.16 points, or 0.97%, to 44,296.51, the S&P 500 gained 20.63 points, or 0.35%, to 5,969.34 and the Nasdaq Composite gained 31.23 points, or 0.16%, to 19,003.65.

items.title: Live: Nifty Poised Gap Up Open Post Maharashtra Poll Results? Zomato Enters Sensex| Opening Bell
items.description: India’s equity markets are likely to react positively to the BJP-led Mahayuti alliance’s landslide victory in Maharashtra. The GIFT Nifty is hinting at a 2% gap up at open. The market saw a strong surge on Frioday with the Nifty reclaiming the 23,900 mark. Sensex and Nifty are marginally down for the month, following October’s fall of nearly 6%. Will the Maharashtra poll verdict be just a feel good factor or is this the start of a new leg of upmove? Also among stocks to watch Zomato will be in focus as it enters Sensex and Citi has upgraded RIL saying risk/reward has turned favourable after a period of underperformance. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with Osho Krishan, Sr. Analyst - Technical & Derivative Research, Angel One and market expert, Sunil Subramaniam

items.title: Agri picks report August 09, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, Farmers in Gujarat have sown rabi crops over 768,543 hectares as of Monday, down nearly 35% on year from 1.2 million hectares sown in the same period last year, according to a release by the state agriculture department.

items.title: NTPC| Why is it the right time to check this power stock? Stock of the Day
items.description: NTPC is executing an aggressive investment strategy, focusing heavily on renewable energy, with its group capex increasing by 32.3% and standalone capex surging by 76% in the first half of the financial year. The company has added 2,619 MW of new capacity during the quarter and aims to expand its power generation capacity to 130,000 MW by 2032, with a major contribution from renewables. Despite a slight dip in Q2FY25 revenue and EBITDA margins, NTPC's net profit grew by 14.3%, supported by strong contributions from group companies and JVs. The stock is valued reasonably, and the potential listing of NTPC Green Energy could unlock further value.

items.title: Live: Nifty Reclaims 24,200 As Mahayuti Win Fires Up Bulls| Realty Stocks, RIL In Focus|Closing Bell
items.description:
Nifty rallies over 4% in just 2 sessions. Sensex reclaims 80,000 amid all-round cheer. Broader markets outperform; smallcap index up 2%. NSE advance-decline ratio at 3:1 
India VIX cools nearly 5%. All sectors trade with gains led by PSU banks & realty. PSUs make a strong comeback. Join Nandita Khemka and Yatin Mota as they break down the key stocks to watch and discuss insights on market performance trends and sectoral movements.
#nse #bse #stockmarket #sharemarket
